enWisdom: Hasten towards good and you will be guided
Hasten towards good and you will be guided
Be optimistic and you will become successful

Wisdom: جِمَاعُ الْخَيْرِ فِي الْمُوَالاةِ فِي اللَّهِ وَالْمُعَادَاةِ فِي اللَّهِ وَالْمَحَبَّةِ فِي اللَّهِ وَالْبُغْضِ فِي اللَّهِ
enWisdom: The consolidation of good is in making friendship for the sake of Allah and making enmity for the sake of Allah; [in] loving for the sake of Allah and hating for the sake of Allah

Wisdom: خَيْرُ الْأُمُورِ مَا سَهُلَتْ مَبَادِيهِ وَحَسُنَتْ خَوَاتِمُهُ وَحُمِدَتْ عَوَاقِبُهُ
enWisdom: The best matters are those that are easy to initiate, end well and give praiseworthy results

Wisdom: خَيْرُ الْأُمُورِ أَعْجَلُهَا عَائِدَةً وَأَحْمَدُهَا عَاقِبَةً
enWisdom: The best matters are those that give the quickest benefit and the most praiseworthy results

Wisdom: خَيْرُ الْأُمُورِ النَّمَطُ الْأَوْسَطُ إِلَيْهِ يَرْجِعُ الْغَالِي وَبِهِ يَلْحَقُ التَّالِي
enWisdom: The best affair (of this ummah) is [taking] the middle course; to it return those who have gone to the extreme and with it join those who have lagged behind

Wisdom: إِنَّ مَا تُقَدِّمُ مِنْ خَيْرٍ يَكُنْ له [لَكَ ذُخْرُهُ وَمَا تُؤَخِّرُهُ يَكُنْ لِغَيْرِكَ خَيْرُهُ
enWisdom: Verily that which you send forth of good actions will be preserved for you and that which you delay [or postpone] will benefit other than you

Wisdom: رُبَّ خَيْرٍ وَافَاكَ مِنْ حَيْثُ لَا تَرْتَقِبُهُ
enWisdom: Sometimes good may come upon you from where you least expect it
The determination to do good extinguishes the fire of evil

Wisdom: غَارِسُ شَجَرَةِ الْخَيْرِ تَجْتَنِيهَا أَحْلَى ثَمَرَةٍ
enWisdom: The planter of the tree of good reaps the sweetest fruit

Wisdom: مَنْ لَبِسَ الْخَيْرَ تَعَرَّى مِنَ الشَّرِّ
enWisdom: Whoever wears [the garment of] virtue disrobes himself of evil

Wisdom: مَنْ لَمْ يَعْرِفْ مَنْفَعَةَ الْخَيْرِ لَمْ يَقْدِرْ عَلَى الْعَمَلِ بِهِ
enWisdom: One who does not know the benefit of a good action will not be capable of performing it
The ‘evil’ that is followed by Paradise is not [really] evil

Wisdom: لَا تَعُدَّنَّ شَرّاً مَا أَدْرَكْتَ بِهِ خَيْراً
enWisdom: Never count as evil that through which you realized good
